Text: farewellColleagues Tomorrow will be my last day at Enron and I would like to thank each of you for making my time in the Research Group such an enriching experience both professionally and personally I have learned a tremendous deal as a member of this group and I consider myself very lucky to have worked among a group of such talent and diversity I wish you all the very best of luck and I hope you will stay in touch My permanent email address is With best regards Kate
